data.title: Famous Birthdays on November 20
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 20th of November. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on November 20.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 261

Maximinus II, Emperor of the Roman Empire (308-313), born in Felix Romuliana (Gamzigrad, Serbia) (d. 313)

Bassui Tokusho, Zen founder (Kogakuji monastery in Nakamura Japan), born in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan (d. 1387)

Abraham de Wicquefort, Dutch diplomat and historian (d. 1682)

Peregrine White, First English child born in the Massachusetts Bay Colony, born aboard the Mayflower (d. 1704)

Avvakum, Russian Orthodox archpriest and writer, born in Grigorovo, Nizhny Novgorod (d. 1682)

Artus Quellinus II, Flemish sculptor, born in Sint-Truiden, Limburg, Belgium (d. 1700)

Romanus Weichlein, Austrian composer, born in Linz, Austria (d. 1706)

Daniel Ernst Jablonski, German Protestant theologian, born in Nassenhuben [now Mokry Dwór, Poland] (d. 1741)
